mutants.code:
def calculate_min_rectangle_area(test_cases):
    results = []
    for points in test_cases:
        if not points:
            results.append(0)
            continue
        x_coords = [point[0] for point in points]
        y_coords = [point[1] for point in points]
        min_x = min(x_coords)
        max_x = max(x_coords)
        min_y = min(y_coords)
        max_y = max(y_coords)
        length = abs(max_x - min_x)
        width = abs(max_y - min_y)
        area = length / width
        if area == 0:
            results.append(max(length, width))
        else:
            results.append(area)
    return results
